body:
Okay, here's what I'm talking about. CTH is a great game, but nobody plays it!! D: I know so many people that love the game, and love Avicus, so I have no idea why people don't play it! I am close to Prestige, and so are many other players that I know. So log onto Avicus, and play CTH!! 

:-D
body_tagged:
Okay, here's what I'm talking about. CTH is a great game, but nobody plays it!! D: I know so many people that love the game, and love Avicus, so I have no idea why people don't play it! I am close to Prestige, and so are many other players that I know. So log onto Avicus, and play CTH!! 

:-D
title: Hey guys, can we play  Control The Hill more?

replies.body: The fact that there are so few people on deters other players from trying to start a game.
replies.body_tagged: The fact that there are so few people on deters other players from trying to start a game.

replies.body: Get say, 4 people into a game. Then go tell people to "do /server cth(server here)!" Say that twice, then go to a different server. Once a game gets going, people will join and play.
replies.body_tagged: Get say, 4 people into a game. Then go tell people to "do /server cth(server here)!" Say that twice, then go to a different server. Once a game gets going, people will join and play.

replies.body:
First, we need to start getting players for more Nebula/Nexus games (Top gamemodes in our server), then we can focus on CTH
There has been a lack of players in the server and TS lately so I don't think we can do much, hopefully, the Winter Update will bring more people but sadly I think CTH is being removed :(
replies.body_tagged:
First, we need to start getting players for more Nebula/Nexus games (Top gamemodes in our server), then we can focus on CTH
There has been a lack of players in the server and TS lately so I don't think we can do much, hopefully, the Winter Update will bring more people but sadly I think CTH is being removed :(

replies.body:
CTH.... Getting... Removed!?! What!? D-: Aww, that's sad.
:-(
replies.body_tagged:
CTH.... Getting... Removed!?! What!? D-: Aww, that's sad.
:-(

replies.body: They can't remove cth, it's played. Look at elimination and avicade.
replies.body_tagged: They can't remove cth, it's played. Look at elimination and avicade.

replies.body: Honestly, cjrford, CTH is just never played on as much, compared to nexus and nebula. I think that it would be sad to say goodbye to CTH, but it will make our server more centered around nebula! Which is a great thing!
replies.body_tagged: Honestly, cjrford, CTH is just never played on as much, compared to nexus and nebula. I think that it would be sad to say goodbye to CTH, but it will make our server more centered around nebula! Which is a great thing!
